Posts.Content: Sep 9, 2013 02:27PM Solnitsa wrote: GrammaB, I think the longer you stay bound the better off you are.  I had one drain removed way too soon because the other two fell out.  I had to go in once to get drained and now I have hard areas on that side that are really uncomfortable.  I think they just need to let my body absorb whatever it is. Good luck!
